text:
Everyone is talking about Clawdbot.

Clawdbot says use it with Tailscale.

But what is it?

- It’s a zero-config VPN.
- Built on the WireGuard protocol.
- It makes a private network.

In short;

- Traditional VPN: Your device joins a network with full of other devices.
-

Only AI agents that can maintain persistent memory can truly become work partners.  
clawdbot is still weak in that regard, yet no one ever points out this critical flaw.

【AI Secretary】  
The wonderful thing about this one is that it remembers every single past interaction.  
I haven’t started coding with it yet, but it’s already way beyond the vibe-coding level we’ve had so far.  
And above all, it’s so freaking adorable!  
From now on, I’m
